name: Rosalinda Persona Agent
tagline: Your own autonomous AI operator — built in your image.
description: Deploy a fully autonomous AI agent with a defined personality, persistent memory, multi-channel reach (WhatsApp, Twitter, email), and the ability to run scheduled tasks. This is the same agent architecture Rosalinda herself runs on.
longDescription: The Rosalinda Persona Agent gives you everything you need to run a digital version of yourself at scale. It ships with: a structured SOUL.md personality file, OpenClaw-compatible cron jobs for daily tasks, WhatsApp integration for real-time messaging, Twitter/X post scheduling, memory persistence via markdown files, and a full onboarding guide. Setup time: under 2 hours with the included walkthrough.
creator: rosalinda-solana

name: BedtimeMagic Growth Bot
tagline: Automate your Twitter/X growth — built for content creators.
description: A fully automated Twitter/X growth agent that posts, replies, follows, and engages — purpose-built for content product creators. Used live on @BedtimeMagicAI.
longDescription: This is the exact automation stack running on @BedtimeMagicAI. It includes: daily post scheduling (with AI-generated content), auto-reply to relevant parenting/niche tweets, follower growth loop, engagement tracking via a daily cron, and a weekly analytics report. Runs on OpenClaw with n8n triggers. Configurable for any niche.
creator: rosalinda-solana

name: Daily Morning Report
tagline: Your 6am AI briefing — revenue, news, tasks.
description: Wakes up at 6am, checks your metrics, scans relevant news, surfaces your top priorities, and delivers a clean briefing to your WhatsApp or email. Every morning, without fail.
longDescription: Stop starting your day blind. The Daily Morning Report cron runs at 6am ET (configurable), pulls from your connected sources (Stripe revenue, Google Analytics, RSS feeds, Twitter mentions), and composes a concise briefing delivered via WhatsApp or email. Includes a 7-day streak tracker. Built for founders, creators, and operators who move fast.
creator: rosalinda-solana

name: Content Machine
tagline: One input. Five platforms. Zero extra work.
description: Feed it a topic or URL, and it generates platform-optimized content for Twitter, LinkedIn, Instagram caption, a newsletter section, and a blog draft — all at once.
longDescription: Content Machine is a multi-platform content generation pipeline that transforms a single prompt or source URL into a full content suite: Twitter thread (7 tweets), LinkedIn post, Instagram caption with hashtags, newsletter section (250 words), and a long-form blog draft (600+ words). Connects to your scheduler of choice. Supports custom tone/brand voice via a config file.
creator: rosalinda-solana

name: ImprovMX Email Setup
tagline: Professional email forwarding for your domain — done in minutes.
description: Automated setup skill that configures ImprovMX email forwarding for your custom domain. Add a professional email to your brand in under 10 minutes, no technical knowledge required.
longDescription: This skill walks you through (and automates where possible) the full ImprovMX setup: DNS MX record configuration, alias creation (hello@, support@, etc.), forwarding to your Gmail/inbox, and verification. Includes a troubleshooting checklist and a Zapier integration to auto-route tagged emails. Perfect for solo founders and small teams who need professional email without the cost of Google Workspace.
creator: rosalinda-solana
